metadata.description: Run Nmap with selectable scan profiles

raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<scaninfo type="connect" protocol="tcp" numservices="3" services="22,80,443"/>
<verbose level="0"/>
<debugging level="0"/>

<hostnames>

<ports><port protocol="tcp" portid="22"><state state="filtered" reason="no-response" reason_ttl="0"/><service name="ssh" method="table" conf="3"/></port>
